H0.text: What is the name for a set of marks stamped on gold and silver articles to attest to the genuineness of the metal and the year of testing. Assay Mark

H1.text: What is the name for a set of marks stamped on gold and silver articles to attest to the genuineness of the metal and the year of testing. Metal Stamp

H2.text: What is the name for a set of marks stamped on gold and silver articles to attest to the genuineness of the metal and the year of testing. Purity Seal

H3.text: What is the name for a set of marks stamped on gold and silver articles to attest to the genuineness of the metal and the year of testing. Hallmark

A4.text: A hallmark is an official mark or series of marks struck on items made of metal, mostly to certify the content of noble metalsâ€”such as platinum, gold, silver and in some nations, palladium.

A5.text: Hallmarks are a guarantee of certain purity or fineness of the metal, as determined by official metal (assay) testing.
